name: Daster 7 Kings
description:
daster is a fast paced 2D platformer! challange your way through the levels and unravel stories and befriend characters.

*The pictures are from old builds of Daster. They are to be replaced with new photos.

If you want to  support this project feel free to support us on patreon!  https://www.patreon.com/AcerakGames
